name: AiBo
description:
Gameplay:

AiBo is a 2D platformer shooting/puzzle game where you control two characters at same time.

Development:

This game is still in development (alpha version).

Please, give us your feedback (bugs, desired changes, suggestions...) to help us to make the game better :)

Stay tuned for new updates!
